text: Ali Ardalan () was an Iranian politician affiliated with the National Front. He served as the Minister of Finance under Cabinet of Bazargan in 1979 and then was elected to the Parliament in 1980 legislative election, despite getting barred to take his seat. He served as the chairman of Association for Defense of Freedom and the Sovereignty of the Iranian Nation. == References == Category:National Front (Iran) politicians Category:Iran Party politicians Category:1914 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Iranian elected officials who did not take office Category:Members of the Association for Defense of Freedom and the Sovereignty of the Iranian Nation Category:People from Hamadan Province Category:Finance ministers of Iran
title: Ali Ardalan
